definition: to sing and play (plucked string instrument)
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: The broken strings of Vina sing no more your praise.
sentences.chinese: 七絃琴的斷線不再彈唱讚美你的詩歌。

sentences.english: Kids in the garden playing games.
The talent show in the evening drew the curtain with guitar playing.
sentences.chinese: 晚間的才藝表演在吉它的彈唱中拉開序幕。

sentences.english: Together we've played" Hotel California", you can hear?
sentences.chinese: 我們曾經一起彈唱的《加州旅館》，你還能聽得見麼？

sentences.english: Suddenly her pretty face looked sad, and she did not play or sing again.
sentences.chinese: 突然，她美麗的臉上露出憂傷，不再繼續彈唱。

sentences.english: The broken strings of Vina sing no more your praise.
sentences.chinese: 七絃琴的斷絃不再彈唱你的榮耀。

sentences.english: Obi loves listening to me playing, but he never attempts to join in.
sentences.chinese: 歐比喜歡聽我彈唱，但從沒嘗試加入獻技“。

sentences.english: We brought guitars and played our songs to each other.
sentences.chinese: 我們帶來了吉他，對着對方彈唱我們的歌曲。

sentences.english: We just go on stage and we play.
sentences.chinese: 我們只站在那舞臺上並且彈唱。

sentences.english: It is very relaxing and it calms me down after a tough game.
sentences.chinese: 在一場惡戰之後，彈彈唱唱是很好的放鬆。

sentences.english: Graham: Wonderful! Next, two members of the Guitar Association will play, "Merry Wedding".
sentences.chinese: 有請來自吉他協會的兩位成員，吉他彈唱。

sentences.english: Also welcome you taking your own music instruments along.
sentences.chinese: 當然你也可以帶上自己喜歡的樂器來彈唱。

definition: singing voice/fig. original voice of a poet
Bes, a minor god of ancient Egypt
to play or strum a lute or other stringed instrument
to compose a piece of music
